title: Blue Dungarees
body_html:
Overview

The Tom’s Trunks Blue Dungarees are perfect for sliding into after a long day, or wearing all day and night whilst making shapes on the dance floor. The fabric is made from 100% natural cotton sourced in Pakistan and the dyes used to achieve the beautiful colours do not use harmful chemicals. The fabric of this product is based on core design stigma from the classic Kenyan Kikoy. All of our products are made to the highest quality as we believe that clothing should last the test of time. 

Fit

The loose fit and lightweight material makes them incredibly comfortable whilst keeping you cozy. Due to our unisex sizing, please use our size guide to check your fit.

Features

The Dungarees have 3 Pockets: a front pouch with a button to seal, and two side pockets. The straps are adjusted by tying knots in different locations, making them incredibly versatile.

Care

Due to the nature of our natural cotton, the garment will shrink on initial washing. The Dungarees can be washed at 40°C but we recommend 30°C to reduce environmental impact.

title: Blue Lounge and Yoga Pants
body_html:
Overview
Tom’s Trunks Lounge & Yoga Pants are designed to be lived in. Whether you are travelling around the world or chilling out after a long day, they are your perfect companion.

Fit
Tom’s Trunks are designed to have a loose fit, enhancing comfort. The elasticated waist and drawstring make them extremely versatile.
If you have any questions regarding fit or sizing, please drop us a message.

Features
Equipped with deep pockets to prevent your phone from falling out, they are also able to pack inside their own pocket which is perfect for travelling.

Material
Made from 100% natural cotton. Originally inspired by Kenyan Kikoy Fabric.

Care
Machine washable, Tom’s Trunks get better with every wear. Due to the nature of the cotton, they will shrink slightly on the first wash. Please give them a wash to get their true size, we will accept exchanges for size changes of products that have been washed once for trying on.
tags: Blue, CLA-BLU/WHI, Classic Trouser, Classics, Trousers

title: Blue Sarong
body_html:
Overview

Tom’s Trunks Sarongs are designed to be lived in. Whether you are sitting on a beach or chilling out after a long day, they are your perfect companion.

Fit

Tom’s Trunks Sarong is a wrap-around skirt with a simple design. It is one size fits all, with an easily adjustable waist.

If you have any questions regarding fit or sizing, please drop us a message.

Features

Completely adjustable with a long tie, the Tom’s Trunks Sarong is designed to fit you perfectly.

Material

Made from 100% natural cotton. Originally inspired by Kenyan Kikoy Fabric.

Care

Machine washable at 40°C, although we suggest 30° to reduce environmental impact. Tom’s Trunks get better with every wear. Due to the nature of the cotton, the product will shrink slightly on the first wash.

title: Storm Offshore Lounge Pants
body_html:
Overview

The Offshore Lounge Pants are the most comfortable and sustainable Tom’s Trunks yet, with no compromises for you or the environment. The first product in our Storm range, which represents and embodies a mission to do better for the environment. We are always seeking ways to tread more lightly on our environment, so our Offshore Pants use dyes and fabric that would be otherwise wasted during the production process, minimising our environmental impact and helping us step closer to our waste-free mission.

Fit

Storm Trousers are the best fitting Tom’s Trunks to date with an optional ankle drawstring, making them perfect for doing Yoga in, and with increased stretch due to the patchwork.

Features

Storm Trousers are practical for the everyday, with 4 trouser pockets.

Care

Due to the nature of organic cotton, Offshore lounge pants will shrink slightly in the first wash. They can be washed at 40, but we encourage you to wash at 30 to reduce energy use.
Made from cotton sourced in Pakistan and manufactured by our partner factory.

title: The Smock
body_html:
The Tom’s Trunks Storm Smock will be your new comfort jumper. Its Cotton & Hemp blend is super heavyweight and soft, and the oversized design is easy and relaxed. Inspired by traditional Inuit smocks, it is ready to keep you warm when it gets truly arctic.
Features
The Smock is packed with features: super soft quilted cuffs with our classic Sundowner Stripe, a drawstring hood, hanging tag at the back and kangaroo pouch for storage
Material
We always strive for sustainability, and the Storm Smock is constructed using a hemp and cotton blend which doesn’t need toxic chemicals to grow and uses four times less water than cotton. 23% Hemp and 77% cotton jersey for a durable, sustainable and soft jumper. Long-lasting, heavy-duty seams and non-polluting dyes.
Fit
The Smock comes in an oversized fit, and we recommend sizing down for a more regular fit.
Care
Our Hemp & Cotton mix is not only soft and sustainable but very durable, with the Hemp being 10X stronger than cotton which is already super durable! It can be washed at 40, although we suggest 30 to reduce environmental impact.
